definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
Sina, Chinese web portal and online media company
newly added/additional/to add (to what already exists)
Xinjiang/Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三岁女孩，现在是一个新的活女神在尼泊尔。

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: A new thyristor medium-frequency power supply startup circuit is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新的晶闸管中频电源启动电路。

sentences.english: It adds a new entry to the first line in a file.
sentences.chinese: 它在文件的首行添加一个新条目。

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我们住在布朗克斯时，三楼搬来一家新租户。

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是这种失败感使他决心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡晓云加入担任业务群总监，还有一些新成员加盟。

sentences.english: Here is a list of what it will include.
sentences.chinese: 以下是它所能够包含的新特性列表。

sentences.english: I take care of my new T-shirt as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我很小心我的新T恤，这是很自然的事。

sentences.english: And Trump's governing concept shows a strong inclination toward neo-isolationism.
sentences.chinese: 从其执政理念看，新孤立主义倾向明显。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 这位新总理主要从年轻人中物色人选组建政府。

sentences.english: Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 还是提供的新产品和服务不属于旧的网站的一部分？

sentences.english: But recently some people presented a new algebraic diagonalization method.
sentences.chinese: 最近有人提出一种新的代数对角化方法。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨烧伤科新护士综合护理能力的培养方法。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 该集团还推出了太阳镜和化妆品等新的副产品。

sentences.english: Slug test is a new method to obtain aquifer parameters.
sentences.chinese: 重锤试验是一种获得含水层水文地质参数的新方法。

definition: to reform oneself/to mend one's ways and start life anew
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to make new advances/to move forwards
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
